text: int main ( ) { int nTest ; scanf ( "%d" , & nTest ) ; int N ; unsigned int row [ 100 ] ; while ( nTest -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; memset ( row , 0 , sizeof ( row ) ) ; int i ; for ( i = 1 ; i < N + 1 ; ++ i ) { int curr , temp , prev = 0 ; int j ; for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; ++ j ) { curr = 0 ; char c ; do { c = getchar ( ) ; } while ( ! isdigit ( c ) ) ; do { curr = curr * 10 + c - '0' ; c = getchar ( ) ; } while ( isdigit ( c ) ) ; temp = MAX ( prev + curr , row [ j ] + curr ) ; prev = row [ j ] ; row [ j ] = temp ; } } int j , max = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < N ; ++ j ) { max = MAX ( max , row [ j ] ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } }
